publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4981 Bill Butler: Show Racism the Red Card - Fortnight of Action—That the Parliament welcomes Show Racism the Red Card’s (SRTRC) 3rd annual Fortnight of Action which takes place from 17 to 30 October 2006; notes its formal launch at an event held in the Parliament on Tuesday 17 October; applauds the campaign’s ambition to build on last year’s success when over 100 events involving minority ethnic groups, community organisations, all 42 professional clubs, football fans, schools and young people were organised nationwide, and commends the Scottish Executive, UNISON and the City of Edinburgh Council, in conjunction with SRTRC, for providing Action Grants which promote community involvement and partnership as part of the campaign to tackle racism and exclusion through football. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Michael McMahon*, Mr Charlie Gordon*, Janis Hughes*, Bruce Crawford*, Marlyn Glen*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
